name: Plant Health Monitoring System
description: Example to simulate a Plant Health Monitoring System.
author: Fabio Federici

hwreq: Board with I2C, AIO and GPIO
Grove Moisture Sensor connected to an analog port
Grove Temperature Sensor connected to another analog port
GUVA-S12D UV sensor to another analog port
Grove Dry-Reed Relay connected to a digital port
Jhd1313m1 LCD connected to any I2C port
